meanings.definition: Animals that regulate their body temperature internally.
meanings.sent1: Endotherms keep themselves warm by controlling their own body heat.
meanings.sent2: Endotherms are able to maintain a constant body temperature regardless of the external environment.
meanings.sent3: The endotherms at the zoo always seem to be cozy and comfortable in any weather.
meanings.sent4: In a world of cold and heat, endotherms are like little thermostats, always adjusting.
meanings.sent5: Endotherms are like tiny furnaces inside, always burning to keep themselves warm.

meanings.sent1: Endotherms produce their own warmth from within their bodies.
meanings.sent2: Some endotherms can create heat even when it's freezing outside.
meanings.sent3: The endotherms in the forest are like little heaters, making the place cozy.
meanings.sent4: In a world of cold, endotherms are like walking hot water bottles.
meanings.sent5: Endotherms are like living heaters, always radiating warmth wherever they go.

meanings.sent1: Endotherms are animals that have warm blood flowing through their bodies.
meanings.sent2: Unlike cold-blooded creatures, endotherms can regulate their own temperature.
meanings.sent3: The endotherms in the Arctic are like little suns, bringing warmth to the icy land.
meanings.sent4: In a world of chill, endotherms are like walking blankets of heat.
meanings.sent5: Endotherms are like cozy little fires, always glowing with their own warmth.
